definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: He was considered too lightweight for the job.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为他资历太浅，不适合做这工作。

sentences.english: But they decided I was overqualified for the job.
sentences.chinese: 但是就此工作，他们认为我资历过高，大材小用。

sentences.english: Less than 40 per cent of businesses bother to check academic and professional qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 不足40百分号的企业会费心核查教育和职业资历。

sentences.english: I sacrificed two years' seniority by taking the overseas posting.
sentences.chinese: 由于去国外任职，我牺牲了两年的资历。

sentences.english: I had been under the impression that this was a job in which seniority was undesirable.
sentences.chinese: 之前，我一直的印象就是这个工作完全不需要资历。

sentences.english: He is a junior clerk in an office.
sentences.chinese: 他是办公室里资历浅的事务员。

sentences.english: The Artistic Directors of Animato Music Studio will handpick quality tutors and verify their qualifications and experience in person.
sentences.chinese: 本中心艺术总监亲自甄选优秀导导及核实其资历。

sentences.english: Teachers should have two years post-graduate training, instead of one.
sentences.chinese: 每个教师应当具备两年，而非一年的研究生培训资历。

sentences.english: This Foundation Coaching Course is the beginning level into the Coach Accreditation Pathway.
sentences.chinese: 基础级别投球教练课程为投球教练资历之初阶。

sentences.english: I am junior in the office.
sentences.chinese: 我是办公室里资历最浅的。

sentences.english: After seven years on staff, they qualify for paid eight-week sabbaticals.
sentences.chinese: 在公司工作七年后，她们有资历获患上八周带薪歇假。

sentences.english: His allowance was only 30% more than that of the most junior employee, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他的补贴只比资历最浅的职员高出30%。

sentences.english: Prospective coaches can choose from a variety of self-paced certification programs.
sentences.chinese: 想获得教练资历证书的话，有很多培训都能够参加。

sentences.english: By seniority first place goes to Pan.
The ACCA is a certificate of qualification from the British Royal Institute of Chartered Accountants.
sentences.chinese: ACCA是英国皇家特许会计师的资历证书。

sentences.english: Qualifications and great ideas are incompatible.
sentences.chinese: 资历和伟大的想法是不相容的。

definition: to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
to promote to a higher position
